name: 019 Gh_st
description:
" For this series, I wanted to play with a movie I loove : A Ghost Story (dir. David Lowery 2017).
The emptiness of life. 
I used my special technique : Videos_Ultra_Mix_vUltime1.tox wich let me fast display a huge amount of media without any loss a performances (cause I want everything to be REALTIME).
I added some "realtime datamoshing" effects in this project, kinda chaotic to control, but I love the loss of datas we can see, wrecking the medias. Thanks h264. "

Ambers of The Realtime [19-27] : The Ghost series

----
Contact me if you collect it, I can give you a 2000*2000 low compressed H264 version of it + the poem associated with this visual.
